name: Cookie Dough Brownies-Rashell Ainsworth
steps: Melt together butter and cocoa in a large sauce pan. Remove from heat. Mix in sugar and vanilla. Add eggs one at a time and mix in quickly. Stir in flour. Pour batter into a 9 x 13 pan and bake at 350 for 30 minutes.
For frosting: Cream together the butter and sugar. Add the vanilla and mix well. Add the flour and salt. Stir in the milk and beat until the frosting is fluffy. Gently stir in the chocolate chips.
